analysis.description:
PostboyTokenCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/21/0x8fac0d6f6ea7a79c2da7e3f52535f2a5ed89b39f.sol#341-368) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/21/0x8fac0d6f6ea7a79c2da7e3f52535f2a5ed89b39f.sol#360-363)

PostboyTokenCrowdsale.closeCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/21/0x8fac0d6f6ea7a79c2da7e3f52535f2a5ed89b39f.sol#368-372) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/21/0x8fac0d6f6ea7a79c2da7e3f52535f2a5ed89b39f.sol#371-372)
